reviews.text: Great service! Thanks guys
reviews.reviewer_name: Lake Neighborhoods Real Estate - Kye Fadeley

reviews.text: Always get great service here. Previously purchased from Jetline in coppell where I always felt like I was bothering the employees at the desk..... switched to superior and I could not be happier! Brandon always makes sure I’m well taken care of. Great job guys👍🏻 …

This place is a dream.  Plenty of maneuvering room to bump the dock.  The recieving crew was super nice and quick to get me unloaded.  It was a wee bit confusing figuring out how to get in.  Go to the culdesac and turn right.  First door on the right.
Great staff! They show that they care.
First time there and Mr Curtis Hanson was so nice helpful and understanding. Thank you will be back anytime we need to

1 star because there isn't a way to leave zero stars.  Called and asked about deck drains and was told I could buy 1 or a case what ever I needed.   Drove 2 hours and was told they don't sale to the public  I asked why I want told that when I called.  They said sorry for your bad luck.
Superior pool products is not open to the public and requires that you set up an account
Great customer service and very knowledgeable about all products
A great group of guys taking care of your swimming pool professional
Great place for pool equipment. The guys are very knowledgeable and helpful
Quick and they actually put in my Po's correctly haha
Very helpful. I dont go anywhere else.
They always have what i need to get the job done.
charges different companies different prices for same stuff.
Great place to get pool supplies
Professional staff. It’s my go to for pool supplies.
Fantastic people to work with!
Good prices on supplies
Its nothing like a pool in Texas
Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review!
Thank you for the review,  Shane!
